result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Martez Donell Grandberry JR

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Martez Donell Grandberry JR not in court, in custody.  Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court for Martez Donell Grandberry JR.  Attorney William T. Berens in court for State of Wisconsin. Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court. Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed by the final pretrial date. Any other motions and notice of alibi must be filed by the final pretrial. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 4.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Martez D Grandberry JR appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court for Martez D Grandberry JR.  Attorney William T. Berens appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Detective Z. Johnson. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty. Defense to be heard on bail on the next date. Case is adjourned to Branch 04.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Martez D Grandberry JR appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court for Martez D Grandberry JR.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is a witness in a jury trial; unable to appear. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion to Dismiss with Prejudice.  (Martez D. Grandberry, Jr. - #2022007096, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Martez D. Grandberry, Jr. - #2022007096, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court by video, defendant Martez D Grandberry not in court, in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for status of counsel. Attorney Sargent has been appointed. Court ordered case adjourned for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility. Defense to be heard on bail on the next date.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Martez D. Grandberry - #2022007096, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Speedy Trial.  (Martez D. Grandberry - #2022007096, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court, defendant Martez D Grandberry not in court, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Attorney Flynn has been appointed to this matter in error. SPD to appoint new counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for status in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Status conference scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Martez D Grandberry not in court, defendant in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for preliminary hearing. OPD needs additional time to appoint an attorney.  State request the matter be set for a State V. Lee hearing.  Court finds good CAUSE to adjourn preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with KSR; TAS; GRM
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Martez D Grandberry in court with attorney Jade K Hall.  Defendant Martez D Grandberry in custody.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Martez D Grandberry appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Hanrahan, Branch 04. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL. Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4). This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
